page.title: 11BARNABY SIDE FARM
page.content: All the land in this area is{farmland apart from one small{deciduous wood. The{farm building}is at the foot of the hill with the fields behind it.We saw{spring sown barley}in one field. Other areas were just{grassland}while nearer to the farm there where{pigs. The only other buildings in this area are called{Greenwood Cottages.}These are two{sandstone}cottages which are probably used by the{farm workers. Near to the cottages we could see a raised mound running across the field.This was the course of an old {railway track}which probably was used by the{mines.
